services

Class ShoppingListService

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.ShoppingListService

  • @Path(value="/groups/{groupId}/shoppingLists/")
public class ShoppingListService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service that handles reading, making, updating and deleting shopping list information.
    Author:
    BK, johanmsk, Martin Wangen, enoseber

      • getShoppingListByGroupId

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.util.ArrayList<ShoppingList> getShoppingListByGroupId(@PathParam(value="groupId")
                                                                                                              int groupId)
        Method that gets an ArrayList of shoppingLists for the given group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - The ID of the group you are trying to get the shopping lists for.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of shopping lists that corresponds to the groupId given.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.ServerErrorException - when failing to get shopping list.

      • updateShoppingList

        @PUT
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public void updateShoppingList(ShoppingList shoppingList)
        Method that updates the name and/or party_id of a shopping list. NOT the item/user-array.
        Parameters:
        shoppingList - The shopping list you are updating to.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.ServerErrorException - when failing to update shopping list.
